instanceVariables.name: identifier
instanceVariables.desc: The game-wide identifier of this item.

instanceVariables.name: level
instanceVariables.desc: the level of the item, and its requirement

instanceVariables.name: value
instanceVariables.desc: How much this item is worth, in coins.

instanceVariables.name: simpleName
instanceVariables.desc: The internally referenced name of this item.

instanceVariables.name: fullName
instanceVariables.desc: The beautified name of this item.

instanceVariables.name: type
instanceVariables.desc: The overarching type of this item. e.g. head, offHand, etc.

instanceVariables.name: lore
instanceVariables.desc: The cosmetic only lore for this item. No gameplay impact.

instanceVariables.name: classRestrictions
instanceVariables.desc: Which classes are allowed to utilize this item.

instanceVariables.name: sound
instanceVariables.desc: Which type of sound to play regarding this item.
